editorialNotes.short: Something's very wrong here. Can you get out alive?

editorialNotes.standard: The latest in this gorgeous, long-running tower defence series adds cool twists, like playing with two heroes at once.

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't let the zombies stop you

editorialNotes.standard: This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

editorialNotes.tagline: A wild sprint to the finish

editorialNotes.tagline: Join the battle for Bikini Bottom

editorialNotes.standard: Sure, there are skateboarding games that let you pull 900s from telephone wires, then land in a manual, collecting millions of points. But when you want realism and complexity, you want True Skate. For years, True Axis skateboarding simulator has been letting us ollie, grind and kickflip with our fingers. Competing with your friends, scouting gaps and completing missions is great fun, but the true reward is perfecting a line and nailing incredible tricks with just the right swipes.

editorialNotes.tagline: Or just bundle up and enjoy the ride.
Put an end to the terror

editorialNotes.standard: Catchy music, incredible combo-filled combat, co-op play, and a blast of nostalgic spirit ensures this classic brawling series still packs a punch.

editorialNotes.short: Charge up the classic for your phone.

ios.subtitle: Its not a bug, its a feature

ios.subtitle: Feed Hungry Fish And Grow Big

editorialNotes.standard: Pencil in time for nostalgic cannon duels in this hand-drawn reimagining of an old-school classic, where cannonballs fly while scribbled tumbleweeds bounce across graphite landscapes.

Terry Cavanaghs Super Hexagon is quite simply one of the most challenging games weve ever played. A pulsating chiptunes soundtrack underscores the danger as swirling walls close in around you and you race to escape the contracting maze. With the geometric action heaping on the punishment (the easiest difficulty is appropriately labeled Hard), every small achievement feels like a massive victory, whether youre topping your high score or overcoming a singularly tricky section.
editorialNotes.short: This is still one of our favourites. Few games are this satisfying to master.

editorialNotes.standard: Youre a goat, free to run wild and cause mayhem in a virtual town. And trust us: that premise leads to tons of hilarious moments and stunts. Weve crashed parties, head-butted cars, bounced on trampolines, and done a million other goofy things in this outrageous sandbox game.

Badland is an eerie sidescroller in which you guide a nondescript creature through creepy and perilous environments. Thanks to simple controls and obvious objectives, the game is instantly accessible, but winding levels and unique power-ups make each stage an exercise in careful timing and hasty strategies. As the gameplay evolves and becomes increasingly bizarre, Badland remains incredibly fun.

editorialNotes.tagline: Slash and dash in this mash

editorialNotes.standard: It only takes about five minutes to realize just how strange Severed is. But to rescue your family, youre going to have to dive right in, mastering the excellent swipe-based combat, travelling through a magical realm filled with danger, andyeahcollecting some severed limbs. Like we said, its a little weird. But this Apple Design Award winner is also gorgeous, atmospheric, and totally memorable.

editorialNotes.short: Leave the comfort of your solar system and soar into epic space battles.

editorialNotes.tagline: Clean up Gotham one brick at a time

editorialNotes.standard: The makers of the clever and addictive game 10000000 are at it again with an even bigger and wilder tile-matching, dungeon-exploring adventure. The pleasing mix of strategic depth and thrilling luck works beautifully as you make your way up a river, assemble an oddball assortment of crewmates, battle mythological creatures andyou guessed itbuild a boat. The retro graphics and jaunty chiptunes soundtrack are immediately charming, while defeating never-ending waves of monsters requires keen eyes and quick fingers.

editorialNotes.standard: Deliver packages to rebuild a ravaged societyand unravel supernatural mysteriesin this wild post-apocalyptic adventure crafted by legendary game maker Hideo Kojima.
